login

Class Login

  • java.lang.Object
    • login.Login

  • public class Login
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all calls for login and creating a new user in our database

      static java.lang.Boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String newUser, java.lang.String passw, java.lang.String passw2)
      This function takes the username, password, and retyped password and will create a new user if the username does not already exist in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • checkUser

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkUser(java.lang.String user,
                                          java.lang.String passw)
        This function takes the user name and password a user enters and checks to determine if the user exists in the database or not
        Parameters:
        user - Username value
        passw - User's password
        Returns:
        re This will return true on the user's existence and false otherwise

      • createNewUser

        public static java.lang.Boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String newUser,
                                              java.lang.String passw,
                                              java.lang.String passw2)
        This function takes the username, password, and retyped password and will create a new user if the username does not already exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        newUser - Username value
        passw - password value
        passw2 - retyped password value
        Returns:
        re This will return true if the username does not exist and the passwords are the same
